顅字的基本解释

顅
qiān
鬓发脱落的样子。
长（颈）：“数目顅脰。”

顅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiān］
［《廣韻》苦閑切，平山，溪。］
长颈貌。

顅字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　顅； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1406第02
【唐韻】苦閑切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】丘閑切，?音慳。【說文】頭鬢少髮也。　又【集韻】長脰貌。【周禮·冬官考工記·梓人】數目顅脰。【註】顅，長脰貌。　又【玉篇】居研切【集韻】經天切，?音肩。又【集韻】輕煙切，音牽。又【五音集韻】戸弔切，皛去聲。義?同。

考證：〔【五音集韻】戸弔切，皛上聲。〕　謹照原文上聲改去聲。
顅字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
顅字的起名意思

暂无。

Yelling
qiān
The appearance of her temples falling off.
Long (neck): "The number is stubborn."

["Guangyun" bittersweet cutting, flat mountains, streams. ]
Long neck appearance.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Page Department】　顅; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1406 No. 02
[Tang Yun] bitter and free cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun] Qiu free cut, sound saving. [Said the text] There is less hair on the head and temples.　[Jiyun] Long appearance. 【Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji·Zi Ren】The number is stubborn. [Note] 顅, long appearance.　[Jade chapter] Juyan cut [Jiyun] cut through heaven, sound shoulder. Also 【Jiyun】Cut the smoke lightly and lead the sound. Also [Pentagram Rhyme] 戸hanging and cutting, wailing. Righteous? Same. Textual research: [[Five Yinjiyun] Suspension cut, Sui Shangsheng. 〕 　 I would like to change the sound according to the original sound.
